title: Employee schedule verification
content: Working time above the limit of labor standardsThis alert lets you know that you are going to pay employees overtime.When an employee has too many scheduled hours in the week, their name will appear in the scheduling checklist. The application will tell you the number of hours the employee has to schedule compared to the number of hours recommended by labor standards.Here's how to fix it: Click on the description of the error, this will lead you to the problem,Change the employee's work hours,Move your mouse over the shift to modify, when the three icons appear below it, click on   to modify,Click on Save.Tip: Decrease/ remove paid meal times to decrease the total number of hoursYou can remove this check: Click on your name at the top right,Clear the box Verify Overtime,Click on Validate,Log out of Emprez and then log in again.This will remove the verification for your view only. If other users do not want to see this verification, they will have to do the same steps too.Inactive hiring statusThe employee is inactive but has scheduled hours remainingWhen an employee is inactive, he will not appear in the list of employees in the Schedules menu. On the other hand, if you have prepared your schedules and the employee leaves his position earlier, the application warns you that the employee is no longer active and that you must replace him with another.Here's how to fix it:  Click on the description of the error to lead you to the problem, Schedule someone else to replace the inactive employee, or by using the Missing shift,Delete the schedule on the screen by clicking on ,Click on Save.If you make the correction for several weeks, do not forget to record when you go from one week to another.If the employee has left, remember to put the employee invisible, if you have not already done so. Click here if you need help.Other cases with the same error If the error persists when there is no more schedule, the schedule may be in an inactive position.Here's how to fix it:  Activate inactive extensionGo to the Employee file,Click on Position(s),Click on  for the inactive position,Check the box The position is active for this employee,Click on Save.Delete the schedule linked to this position Click on Schedules, on the bottom left,Go to the week where there is the error,Delete the schedule on the screen by clicking on  on the bottom right,Click on Save.OR Return to the Dashboard,Click on the description of the employee's error to access the schedule,Delete the schedule on the screen by click on  on the bottom right,Click on Save.If you make the correction for several weeks, don't forget to save when you go from one week to the next.Desactivate inactive position Go back to the Employee file,Click on Position(s),Click on  opposite the position you activated previously,Uncheck the box The position is active for this employee,Click on Save.You can remove the employee status check like this: Click on your name at the top right,Uncheck the box Hide employee schedules validation in the Dashboard,Click on Validate,Log out and return to Emprez.This removes the verification for your view only. If other users do not want to see this check, they will have to do the same steps too.No availabilityAn employee was scheduled on a day when he is not availableHere's how to fix it:  Click on the description of the error to lead you to the problem,Click on the name of the employee at the top right,Click on Work Availability, in the Hiring information section,Click on , Fill in the following window,Close the window.ORYou can ask your employee to submit new availabilities. Click here to access the tutorial for your employee (Do not hesitate to send him this link).You can remove the availability check like this:Click on your name at the bottom right,Uncheck the box Hide employee schedules validation in the Dashboard,Click on Validate,Log out and return to Emprez. This will remove the verification for your view only. If other users do not want to see this check, they will have to do the same steps too.Errors in the allocation of vacationsYour employee may not have enough vacation time in their bank. Check the balance of his vacation and the number of days remaining.To adjust the vacation: Click on Vacation Remaining,Click on  for the current period,Make sure that the last time (Days Remaining and Amount Remaining) are positive or equal to 0,Click on Save.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
